## FASTA Format

```{r}
fasta_path <- "data/fasta_example.fasta"
if (!file.exists(fasta_path)) stop("Missing file: data/fasta_example.fasta")
seqs <- Biostrings::readDNAStringSet(fasta_path)
print(seqs)
```

## BED Format

```{r}
bed_path <- "data/example.bed"
if (!file.exists(bed_path)) stop("Missing file: data/example.bed")
bed_data <- rtracklayer::import(bed_path)
print(bed_data)
```
